June 2014  –  April 2015  (11 months) San Francisco Bay Area BrightRoll is the only independent and unified programmatic video advertising platform for reaching audiences across web, mobile and connected TV. The company powers digital video advertising for the world’s largest brands, including more than 80 of the top 100 US advertisers and 18 of the top 20 advertising technology companies.  
 
The platform enables advertisers to reach 4 in 5 video viewers online and consistently ranks among the top two video ad platforms in ads served. As a result, BrightRoll technology collects and analyzes hundreds of billions of data points monthly enabling real-time decisions that drive ROI for advertisers. Experience Recruiter Yahoo January 2015  – Present (8 months) Greater Los Angeles Area •	Successfully consult and advise hiring managers and candidates through merger of BrightRoll and Yahoo 
•	Support the hiring needs of both the Legal and Sales Organization (combined organizations of over 2,000 members) 
•	Integrate BrightRoll hiring process with that of the Yahoo hiring process 
•	Drive successful hires for both BrightRoll and Yahoo simultaneously, leveling candidates and making successful compensation recommendations based on both BrightRoll and Yahoo guidelines 
•	Successfully map BrightRoll hires with Yahoo internal leveling and compensation guidelines 
•	Hire across multiple BrightRoll offices throughout integration process while establishing BrightRoll hiring process that is in line with Yahoo’s hiring process  
 Talent Engineer BrightRoll (acquired by Yahoo!) November 2013  – Present (1 year 10 months) San Francisco Bay Area •	Position that began as Sourcer; promoted within six months to Talent Engineer  
•	Managed job openings within four months of working at the company  
•	Emphasizing and prioritizing candidate experience to successfully fill every role assigned 
•	Collaborate with General Counsel, VP to hire Associate General Counsel in five weeks 
•	Identify, drive and close multiple passive candidates to fill business needs  
•	Establish model to assist in integration of Talent team with multiple departments across the organization 
•	Create and establish processes to ensure success as the company scales by identifying pain points and inefficiencies,  
•	Counsel hiring managers of all levels, from VP to first-time hiring manager, yielding successful hires 
•	Execute hiring goals across seven offices world-wide 
•	Successfully partner with eight hiring managers world wide to hire across Agency Sales, Trading Desk Partnerships, Media Operations, Accounting, Legal and Product Marketing

Experience Technical Recruiter (Contract) Coast Personnel Services September 2013  –  March 2014  (7 months) Santa Clara I was contracted to respond to all technical recruiting needs for Coast's existing clients. Sr. Account Manager / Business Development Albin Engineering Services, Inc. September 2011  –  September 2013  (2 years 1 month) Santa Clara, Ca. While at AESI, I was responsible for being the point of contact for several key accounts in the South Bay Area. As a result, revenue, profit, and market share grew a minimum of 100% during my tenure. 
 
In addition, I was tasked with managing the recruiting team (on-site and offshore). This included hiring, training, and mentoring internal recruiting team members. This also inculded hands-on recruiting to address niche skills and to demonstrate best practices. 
 
Also, led numerous process improvements to advance team efficiencies in terms of speed of delivery, client satisfaction, and improved KPI's. Managing Director Kforce Inc. December 2010  –  August 2011  (9 months) I was hired to manage all aspects of the company's Silicon Valley operations. I led a team of five account managers and four internal recruiters and a near-shore recruiting team. 
 
Successfully grew all relevant performance indicators quarter over quarter. Manager, Client / Consultant Services Modis Consulting July 2007  –  December 2010  (3 years 6 months) San Jose The Business Development Manager is responsible for developing IT business contacts to place consultants. Modis relies on the Business Development Manager to understand and sell other services such as Beeline and Idea Integration. With our clients it is critical to gather the necessary job requisitions to place qualified consultants. The BDM must facilitate the job requisition information to the Resource Development Manager to effectively recruit talent for our clients. Modis relies on the Business Development Manager to forecast financial projections for growing the business in his or her territory. 
 
Key accomplishments: 
*Average of +300% of GP/GM Goal 
*Grew an anchor account to exclusive fills within 4 months 
*Maintaining a 35+ headcount (Software Developers, QA Engineers, UX Design, Information System Engineers, etc.) 
*Receive high reviews from Clients and Consultants on efforts and effectiveness of placements 
*10% of placed temporary consultants have gone on to receive full time offers after placement based on skill match

Summary I am a superpower identifying recruiter for the team that only bleeds one color.. purple!  
 
I believe in keeping things simple, genuine and transparent. I enjoy partnering with all my colleagues, whether within our talent attraction team or business unit VPs in the common goal of keeping Yahoo great! 
 
Currently focusing on enlisting the top new college grads for Yahoo's prestigious Associate Programs.  
These programs are meant to accelerate the exposure these young minds receive through mentorship, be key players in our new products, but still allow them to stay hungry towards there own personal aspirations.. maybe even CEO.  
 
Yahoo is the world’s largest start-up! We move fast, show our personality, and are relentlessly focused on inspiring and delighting our billion+ users every day. Interested in being part of groundbreaking growth here at Yahoo?  
 
Learn more about our Associate Programs here through Tumblr: 
 
Associate Product Manager Program 
http://yahooapms.tumblr.com/  
 
Engineering Associate Program 
http://yahooeap.tumblr.com/  
 
Design Associate Program 
http://yahoodap.tumblr.com/  
 
Marketing Associate Program 
http://yahoomcap.tumblr.com/  
 
Please feel free to email me at pieagu01@yahoo-inc.com or visit our main careers page at careers.yahoo.com.

 Experience Recruiter Yahoo May 2015  – Present (4 months) Sunnyvale, CA Here a brief highlight of my new adventure at the HOO!.. 
 
• Responsible for the recruitment of Product Management, Engineering, and Design new grad talent for the associate programs.  
 
• Work in a full cycle capacity to identify the top 1% of university talent through campus visits, strategic partnerships, social media engagement and direct referrals.  
 
• Partner with Yahoo leadership to effectively achieve the goals of the Associate Programs. 
 
• Assist with the overall program development and maintain mentorship relationships with current associates. 
 
• Build competitive hiring packets, coordinate logistical relocations and assist in seamless onboarding of all associates.  
 Recruiter Yahoo August 2014  –  May 2015  (10 months) Sunnyvale, CA Here's a highlight of all I tackled and enhanced within the Search team... while yodeling...  
 
• Worked in a full-cycle recruiting environment that included technical assessments, interview arrangements and offer preparations. 
 
• Concentrated on recruitment of Front-end, Back-end, Full-stack engineers and Data scientists with Java, C/C++, Hadoop, QE, Node.js, HTML, CSS5 and JavaScript. 
 
• Developed and reviewed job specifications, technical requirements and candidate qualifications with hiring managers to strategically recruit the best talent. 
 
• Responsible for being the point of contact for multiple groups within the Search organization including Shopping, Search Distribution, and Search Optimization. 
 
• Sourced qualified candidates via Boolean searches, internal database, referrals, LinkedIn, networking and cold calling. 
 
• Implemented changes to the client hiring process that resulted in a hiring increase from 3 hires to 60 hires quarter-over-quarter. 
 
• Hosted hiring meetings and individual sessions with all levels of management within the Search organization to help keep forward hiring momentum and to identify any roadblocks that may have been encountered. 
 
• Established a consultative partnership with managers to provide guidance on the best practices, processes and selection criteria to ensure superior candidate caliber.  
 
• Worked with hiring managers to put together offer packets, which included salary review, candidate synopsis and interview feedback.
